sql.value: SELECT a.authority_id, a.authority, up.expire_time, 'user' AS owner FROM base_authority_user up INNER JOIN base_authority a ON up.authority_id = a.authority_id WHERE up.user_id = :userId AND a.status = 1

SELECT a.authority_id, a.authority, a.status, m.*, ua.user_id, ua.expire_time FROM base_authority_user ua INNER JOIN base_authority a ON ua.authority_id = a.authority_id INNER JOIN base_menu m ON a.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE ua.user_id = :userId AND a.status = 1 #[AND m.service_id = :serviceId]
